mapper.select: SELECT L.lecture_code, L.week_code, L.lecture_reg_date, L.lecture_start_date, L.lecture_end_date, L.lecture_att_time, L.lecture_content, L.video_code, L.lecture_title, L.course_code, V.video_name, V.video_file_path FROM lecture L JOIN video V ON L.video_code = V.video_code WHERE L.week_code IN (SELECT week_code FROM course_weekly WHERE course_code = #{courseCode}) ORDER BY L.week_code DESC

INSERT INTO video ( video_code, video_file_path, professor_id, video_name, video_stored_name, video_play_time, video_reg_date, video_extension ) VALUES ( 'V'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(video_seq.NEXTVAL), 5, '0'), #{videoFilePath}, #{professorId}, #{videoName}, #{videoStoredName}, #{videoPlayTime}, SYSDATE, #{videoExtension} )
SELECT video_code FROM video WHERE video_stored_name = #{videoStoredName}

INSERT INTO lecture ( lecture_code, week_code, lecture_reg_date, lecture_start_date, lecture_end_date, lecture_att_time, lecture_content, video_code, lecture_title, course_code ) VALUES ( SUBSTR(#{weekCode}, 3, 2)||'L'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(lecture_seq.NEXTVAL), 7, '0'), #{weekCode}, SYSDATE, #{lectureStartDate}, #{lectureEndDate}, #{lectureAttTime}, #{lectureContent}, #{videoCode}, #{lectureTitle}, #{courseCode})
